column4: whats the best way to share my HP printer on my ibex server, its headless so i have to do all cli config, cups still the way to go?
cups is the printing service.. :) so its basicially the only way to go.. combo of cups+samba will be needed most likely
i just install the 'ubuntu-restricted-extras' package and it installs flash and java..  ive not had to 'tweak/work/mess' with those in ages.
